Columbia.EdVenture:
For EDventure, a computer industry information company, see Esther Dyson.
EdVenture is the largest children's museum in the Southeast United States, located in Columbia, South Carolina.
EdVenture opened to the public in 2003.It has 8 galleries covering 92,000 square feet (8,500 m2), plus hands-on exhibits, 2 resource centers, and a 200-seat theater.
